name: Lloyds Banking Group plc
membership: Corporate members of trade associations and networks, such as UK Finance, the Association for Financial Markets in Europe (AFME), TheCityUK and the Association of British Insurers (ABI).
memberOrga: Lloyds Banking Group incorporates a range of businesses and brands including Lloyds Bank, Halifax, Bank of Scotland, MBNA and Scottish Widows. Further information is available at www.lloydsbankinggroup.com.
goal: Lloyds Banking Group is a leading UK based financial services group providing a wide range of banking and financial services to personal and corporate customers. Our main business activities are retail, commercial and corporate banking, general insurance, and life, pensions and investment provision. Services are offered through a number of well recognised brands, including Lloyds Bank, Halifax, Bank of Scotland and Scottish Widows.
interests: Banking and financial services, Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, External Relations, Fraud prevention, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: A broad range of financial services and other relevant policy proposals to our business.
